optimization.training_loops.supervised.keras_supervised¶

optimization.training_loops.supervised.keras_supervised(model, train_dset, val_dset, network_params, experiment_params, callbacks, evaluate_on=None, train_steps=None, val_steps=None)¶

train a keras model on a dataset and evaluate it on other datasets then return the ModelData instance

Parameters

  • model – keras model

  • train_dset – tf.data.Dataset for training

  • val_dset – tf.data.Dataset for evaluation

  • evaluate_on – a dictionary of finite objects passable to model.evaluate

  • train_steps – number of steps per epoch

  • val_steps – number of validations steps per epoch

Returns

a ModelData instance

optimization.training_loops.supervised

Next topic

data
